Public Transportation: If walking is not feasible, public transportation such as buses, trains, or trams could be an option. These modes of transportation can be convenient and cost-effective, especially in urban areas.
Electric Scooters: Electric scooters are a popular alternative to bicycles. They are easy to use, foldable, and can be stored in small spaces.
Skateboards: Skateboards are another option for short distances. They are lightweight, portable, and can be used in various terrains.
Rollerblades: Rollerblades are a great way to get around while also getting a good workout. They are also portable and can be used in various terrains.
Ride-sharing Services: Ride-sharing services such as Uber or Lyft can be a convenient option for short distances or when public transportation is not available.
